quoteText:
iii) does not infringe personal rights (i.e.
that is not defamatory and does not contain insults, abuse, libel, etc.) or personal privacy (including an individual's right to his or her image).
(iv) is not contrary to public policy and accepted moral standards
title: Users agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content
